SEARCH
Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx

Class PaymentOptionView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.dlsc.gemsfx.PaymentOptionView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PaymentOptionView extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
A control for displaying different types of payment options, e.g. various credit cards (MasterCard, American Express, Visa) but also new online options such as PayPal or ApplePay. The default width is initialized with 100 pixels, however the images are much bigger than that (500x300).
